error.invalid_device_id: Device ID is not a valid EnOcean ID. A valid EnOcean ID consists of four hexadecimal parts (with at most two digits) separated by colons and is usually printed on the device (e.g. '1E:F4:BA:C7').
error.invalid_sender_id: Sender ID is not a valid EnOcean ID. A valid EnOcean ID consists of four hexadecimal parts (with at most two digits) separated by colons and is usually printed on the device (e.g. '1E:F4:BA:C7'). Even though it is possible to set any valid EnOcean ID here, only the dongle's base IDs or its chip ID can be used for actual sending.
